dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 159 IH: To modify the project for the improvement of the Shallotte River, North Carolina, to change the authorized depth to 8 feet.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McIntyre introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To modify the project for the improvement of the Shallotte River, North Carolina, to change the authorized depth to 8 feet.

section.text: The project for the improvement of the Shallotte River, North Carolina, authorized by the Act of March 4, 1913 (37 Stat. 807), is modified to change the authorized maintenance depth to 8 feet.
